title: It is time for Brussels to compromise so we can move on from Brexit bickering
text:
In the three years since we voted to leave the European Union, Parliament, the country and, yes, even the Conservative Party, have been extremely divided.

I campaigned vociferously for Remain during the referendum campaign and I have been a positive European all my adult life. I am also, however, a democrat, and democracy itself is more important than any political argument.

Quite simply, my side lost.

17.4 million people – the largest number of people to vote for anything, ever, in the history of this country – voted for Brexit. It shouldn’t have taken us three years to act on their instruction, but now we have a plan to do so that will properly command support.

There were valiant efforts...
description: In the three years since we voted to leave the European Union, Parliament, the country and, yes, even the Conservative Party, have been extremely divided.
